siteMetadata.title: Maxence Poutord
siteMetadata.description: Software engineer • Public speaker • Nomadic worker

node.excerpt:
Nowadays, most of our projects use Git as a version control system. It means most of our projects
have a  .git  folder. But, have you ever…

Last October, I joined the so-called Digital Nomad movement. If you have never heard about it, I am
combining remote working with travelling…

After spending a month in Lisbon and another one in Spain, I decided to start 2019 with a continent
I never explored before: Asia. And more…
